body_html:
@killeent here is the proof of concept implementation that I had for advanced indexing https://gist.github.com/fmassa/f8158d1dfd25a8047c2c668a44ff57f4

The idea was to convert the list of indices into a single linear index, view the tensor accordingly and then use index_select on the viewed tensor.

The current implementation in the gist supposes that only the indexing on the integer arrays are performed, and slicing / selection are not taken into account, but it should be easy to extend.
